channel.title: XRechnung on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in XRechnung on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: New and planned
item.description: New and planned Planned March 2024 Setup assistant (wizard) Released versions Version 2.9.0.13 - 22.07.2024 Corrections: The record ID will now be written to the activity entry table, to allow viewing XRechnungen from the document page. Version 2.9.0.12 - 29.05.2024 Corrections: The use of report layouts in combination with Connector 365 Easy Batch has been standardized. Version 2.9.0.11 - 13.05.2024 Corrections: New logic for pulling the report layout implemented. Version 2.

item.title: Videos
item.description: Videos Here you can find some informative videos about our XRechnung, each video covers a special topic Setup & Sending
